domain_description: You will shown 20 images of celestial bodies (stars, galaxies,planets, moons and asteroids) and asked to indicate their name.

task 01.possible_answers: "andromeda galaxy,black eye galaxy,cartwheel galaxy,cigar galaxy,milky way galaxy"
